ModMetaData.name: RainRim
ModMetaData.author: Error: String Expected, Got Nil
ModMetaData.description:
Adds in numerous creatures from the game Rain World. Or, it will, anyways. Work in progress! 

Most recent changes: 
(0.3.0.1) Minor internal changes. 
(0.3.0.0) Lizard tongues now implemented. 
(0.2.0.0) Blue lizard added! Also further adjustments to lizard stats. 
(0.1.1.1) Did a stat balancing pass on the pink lizard. 
(0.1.1.0) Added new color variants for pink lizard.
